title: Riot Merch
body: i can't find information on this anywhere, the nami figure has been retired and I'm not quite sure what that entails. Will it ever be back or is it gone forever?

replies.body: If you hover over the "Retired" message you'll see a little question mark popup that you can click. This takes you over to [**this page**](https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/customer-care/indicator-glossary/) that gives a rundown on what those categories mean exactly.
